## Mixed Script Paragraph

The word "naÃ¯vetÃ©" (French) is often used in English. In Japanese, the concept might be expressed as ç´”çœŸã• (junshinsa). The Greek word Ï†Î¹Î»Î¿ÏƒÎ¿Ï†Î¯Î± (philosophia) means "love of wisdom." In Russian, Ğ¼ÑƒĞ´Ñ€Ğ¾ÑÑ‚ÑŒ means "wisdom," while in Arabic, Ø­ÙƒÙ…Ø© (hikma) conveys a similar meaning.
